General.Name: Samyoung S&C Co. Ltd.
General.Description: SAMYOUNG S&C Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells particle and humidity sensing solutions worldwide. It offers RH and temperature, particle, combo, and resistive RH sensors. The company serves home appliance, automotive, and building management system and IoT applications. It also provides design, wafer fabrication, packaging, modularization, and systemization services. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
